question_stem:
Quiz 5 - Decision Trees
Consider again the dataset <bank-sample.csv> given in the lecture of Topic 5. One would want to build a model (a decision tree) which helps to predict if a customer will subscribe the bank’s service. A decision tree was built using 4 features (marital, education, loan, poutcome) while subscribe (no/yes) is the response. Refer to the photo provided for all subsequent questions.

Please revise the lecture notes (pdf slides for the details of the 5 variables).
Note: in order to score better for this quiz, please watch the pre-recorded videos and attend the live lecture. If you did not attend the live lecture, please watch the record of the live lecture well before taking this quiz.

Question 1
How many people in the data set subscribed to the bank service?
A
1789
B
211
C
58
D
32
